parameter.value: Greetings, |PLAYERNAME|. I sell food & buy creature products, just ask me for a {trade}. I have plenty of tasks to offer, just ask me for a {task}.
Do you want to buy |ITEMCOUNT| |ITEMNAME| for |TOTALCOST| gold coins?
Do you want to sell |ITEMCOUNT| |ITEMNAME| for |TOTALCOST| gold coins?
Sorry but you don't have enough money.
You do not have this object.
You do not have enough capacity.
You do not have enough capacity for all items.
Of course, just browse through my wares.
Thank you, come back whenever you're in need of something else.
|PLAYERNAME|, I am already talking to you.
